item.title: EKC 29 IS IMMINENT. 13 CLOWNS HAS BEEN SET BACK TO DEFAULT AND IS WORKING VERY WELL LATELY. ELEMENTUM IS BEING ABANDONED AT THIS TIME. I MAY EXPLORE IT AGAIN LATER BUT THERE ARE SOME LEGAL ISSUES WITH THE WAY THAT THIS ADDON OPERATES. IF YOU UPDATED AND RECIEVED THE BLUE SCREEN YOU NEED TO HIGHLIGHT ADDONS, CLICK TO THE RIGHT TO EKC WIZARD, EKC WIZARD APK INSTALLER, KODI 18, DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL. ALWAYS UPDATE EKC BEFORE UPDATING KODI. IF DONE OUT OF ORDER YOU WILL NEED TO PAY A NEW PROGRAMMING FEE. AFTER KODI 18 IS INSTALLED, HIGHLIGHT ADDONS AGAIN. EKC WIZARD, EKC WIZARD BUILDS, EKC 2X.XX, FRESH INSTALL THAN FORCE CLOSE.

DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG OR SCAN OUR VENMO CODE ON THE EKC SECTION - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM LIVE CONTENT. PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO UNDER THE GEARS SECTION TO SEE IT IN ACTION. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV - THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
